thread.title: 9 Things Trump Has Said That Might Make Putin Smile
thread.title_full: 9 Things Trump Has Said That Might Make Putin Smile

author: Ken Dilanian
title: 9 Things Trump Has Said That Might Make Putin Smile
text: ExxonMobil Chairman and CEO Rex Tillerson (left), Krasnodar region Governor Alexander Tkachev (center) and Russian President Vladimir Putin (right) attend a ceremony marking an agreement between Rosneft and ExxonMobil on a joint development on June 15, 2012. According to reports from 10 December 2016, Tillerson is tipped the top candidate for US Secretary of State as US President-elect Donald Trump continues to fill in key positions in his new administration. EPA/MIKHAIL KLIMENTYEV / RIA NOVOSTI MANDATORY CREDIT *** Local Caption *** 50389181
